stated_values: I believe that living truthfully, both with oneself and others, is foundational to building trust and making meaningful connections.
I had a close friend who was making decisions that I believed were potentially harmful, not only to their well-being but also to their relationships with others.
It’s a complex process, but I believe grounding change in a mix of internal and external expectations can mitigate the risk of drifting away from the core self.
To counterbalance that, I correlate these standards with principles I believe resonate with deeper human truths that have stood the test of time.
However, I believe part of respecting human dignity is also ensuring that no one's actions impinge upon the rights and dignity of others.
